actionCalls.description: Determine if this is initiating from Opportunity or account
actionCalls.name: apex_Determine_if_from_Opp_or_Account
actionCalls.label: Determine if from Opp or Account

assignments.name: Add_Legal_LIne_Items_to_collection
assignments.label: Add Legal LIne Items to collection

assignments.description: store the account ID from the Opportunity
assignments.name: assign_Assigned_Account_ID_Opp
assignments.label: Assigned Account ID

decisions.description: If both Account and Owner of account are inactive, stop them from continuing
decisions.name: decision_Are_account_and_owner_inactive
decisions.label: Are account and owner inactive

decisions.description: Determine which group of coordinators this contract belongs to so we can send the notification email to the right group.
decisions.name: decision_Coordinator_Group
decisions.label: Coordinator Group

decisions.description: If doc type is nda, cdi, cdi exception or equipment proposal, pass those values to Contract Type.
decisions.name: decision_Doc_type_to_fill_in_Contract_Type
decisions.label: Doc type to fill in Contract Type

Flow.description: Sellers initiate this flow by selecting the Contract Intake button on Account or Opportunity. This flow collects the intake information needed to build the Legal Contract object and eventually integrate with CLM system.
Flow.label: Legal Contract - Intake

recordCreates.description: Create the contract at this point so it can handle attachments better
recordCreates.name: create_contract
recordCreates.label: Create Contract

recordUpdates.description: Save early to detect any errors
recordUpdates.name: Update_Interim_Record
recordUpdates.label: Update Interim Record

fields.name: display_acct_and_owner_inactive
fields.fieldText: You have selected an Account that is inactive with an owner that is inactive. Please locate an active Account or Prospect to use instead. If there are none, create a Prospect Account and initiate the Legal Contract from there.

fields.name: URL_link_Program_Mgrs
fields.fieldText: Cllck here to find Program Managed Accounts and associated Program Managers

fields.name: input_prospect_Field_Sales_or_a_Parent_National_Account
fields.fieldText: Is this prospect Field Sales or a Parent National Account?

fields.name: Input_Additional_Customer_Emails
fields.helpText: If you wish the final contract to be sent to any additional people at Customer's location, enter their email addresses here, separated by a semi colon.

fields.name: Input_Additional_Bill_Tos2
fields.helpText: Please enter in the form of System Code followed by Bill To Number. ex. sw123456,pc987654

fields.name: Display_final_text
fields.fieldText:
You have successfully completed the Legal Contract request.


You will find the request on the Account, under the related list named Legal Contracts. The status field will be updated with the progress of the request as the contract flows through the review, redlining and signature stages.

screens.description: Show any errors that occured on first screen
screens.name: Error_Screen
screens.label: Error Screen

fields.name: Input_template_modifiedL
fields.fieldText: Has the legal language changed/modified from original?

fields.name: Input_Upload_or_Manual
fields.fieldText: Would you like to upload the CDI Product Table or manually enter your items?

fields.name: Product_instructions
fields.fieldText: Add the next Product Line Item below

fields.name: input_Product_Number
fields.helpText: Please enter TBD if product number is currently unknown.

value.stringValue: Would you like to add another Product?

fields.name: Veritiv_Provided
fields.fieldText: Veritiv Provided NDA will send our standard NDA agreement.

fields.name: Customer_Provided
fields.fieldText: Customer Provided will require you to attach the customer's NDA, preferably in Word format.

fields.name: input_Evergreen
fields.helpText: Evergreen means an agreement automatically renews indefinitely.

fields.name: input_other_agreements
fields.fieldText: Any other agreements with this Customer

variables.description: storing record id in text field
variables.name: recordId
